biography_text: PAPPAS, Chris, a Representative from New Hampshire; born in Manchester, Hillsborough County, N.H., June 4, 1980; graduated from Manchester Central High School, Manchester, N.H., 1998; A.B., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2002; restaurant manager; member of the New Hampshire state house of representatives, 2003-2007; Hillsborough County, N.H., treasurer, 2007-2011; member of the New Hampshire executive council, 2013-2019; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
